name: Reconnaissance - Phishing for Information (T1598)
description: Detects suspicious processes, scripts, or network activities that indicate phishing attempts used to collect victim information (MITRE T1598). This may include PowerShell or scripts downloading from known phishing domains, email clients invoking suspicious URLs, or unusual web requests triggered from user processes.
author: Wahid Hendrawan
query: (process.name:(powershell.exe OR cmd.exe OR outlook.exe OR winword.exe) AND process.args:(*Invoke-WebRequest* OR *Invoke-RestMethod* OR *DownloadString* OR *http* OR *https*)) OR (url.domain:(*forms* OR *survey* OR *login* OR *verify* OR *update*) AND event.action:(dns_request OR network_connection))
